mapper.sql: PKID, CASE_CODE, LOAN_CLOSE_CODE, CLOSE_TYPE, UNCLOSE_MONEY, MORTGAGE_BANK
mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TO_CLOSE_LOAN (PKID, CASE_CODE, LOAN_CLOSE_CODE, CLOSE_TYPE, UNCLOSE_MONEY, COMMENT, MORTGAGE_BANK ) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanCloseCode,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{closeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uncloseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{mortgageBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_CLOSE_LOAN
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOAN_CLOSE_CODE = #{loanCloseCode,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CLOSE_TYPE = #{closeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNCLOSE_MONEY = #{uncloseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
MORTGAGE_BANK = #{mortgageBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
,IS_ACTIVE='1' where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TO_CLOSE_LOAN set CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOAN_CLOSE_CODE = #{loanCloseCode,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CLOSE_TYPE = #{closeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNCLOSE_MONEY = #{uncloseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, MORTGAGE_BANK = #{mortgageBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,IS_ACTIVE='1' where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TO_CLOSE_LOAN set CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOAN_CLOSE_CODE = #{loanCloseCode,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CLOSE_TYPE = #{closeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNCLOSE_MONEY = #{uncloseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MORTGAGE_BANK = #{mortgageBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,IS_ACTIVE='1' where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select top 1 e.LOAN_LOST_TYPE from sctrans.V_CASE_LIST_EXCEL E where e.CASE_CODE=#{caseCode}
